categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: The Telaris cometary cloud was a cometary cloud in the Telaris system. During the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, the nascent Rebel Alliance utilized rebel stardocks converted from Mon Cala city-ships to refit Mon Calamari Star Cruisers into warships. In 3 BBY,[source?] the Profundity was the first to enter war production and Colonel Anj Zavor of Rebel Fleet Command sent a report to Commander-in-Chief Mon Mothma with an update of Telaris system operations. Eventually, the Profundity was the first to be completed, followed by Home One and Nautilian.
